## AbstractPostEffect.requireLinearDepthTexture() method

Checks whether this post effect requires the linear depth texture

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract requireLinearDepthTexture(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the linear depth texture is required.
